snippet: A former defense minister has been charged with corruption in connection with the diversion of $1.5 million intended for military spending, the government said.
abstract: Former Nigerian defense minister Bello Haliru Mohammed is charged with corruption in connection with diversion of funds intended for military.
lead_paragraph: A former defense minister has been charged with corruption in connection with the diversion of $1.5 million intended for military spending, the government said.

headline.main: Nigeria: Former Minister Is Charged With Corruption
headline.print_headline: Africa; Nigeria: Former Minister Is Charged With Corruption
